content: purchasable pdf pattern https //www etsy com/listing/564022348/crochet-christmas-santa-sweater-pattern youtube tutorial for armholes https //www youtube com/watch v=6np2blhysv4 materials * size h hook * 2 skeins of harvest red caron simply soft * tapestry needle * scissors * a clasp * you will need to find white fur i bought a skein at hobby lobby and it was called snuggle up i combined it with a white strand of size 2 weight cotton so it would be easier to crochet with and i highly recommend you do the same it gives the fur more structure
